house_listing.house_description: This 2 level detached single family home built in 1970 has 4 bedroom(s), 3 bath(s) , 2 car garage and approximately 2580 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, family room, living room, bonus room, master bedroom. Features include private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Bonus Room, Dining Room, Family Room, Living Room, Master
